tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE HumanRightsViolations (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    violation_type VARCHAR(255),
    victim_name VARCHAR(255),
    date_reported DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE HumanRightsViolations (
    violation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE NOT NULL,
    violation_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    victim_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ViolationReports (
    report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE NOT NULL,
    violation_id INT NOT NULL,
    reporter_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    report_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (violation_id) REFERENCES HumanRightsViolations(violation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE human_rights_violations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    violation_type VARCHAR(100),
    victim_name VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    violation_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    reporter_name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE human_rights_violations (
  violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE victims (
  victim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  violation_id INT,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE perpetrators (
  perpetrator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  violation_id INT,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  organization VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  violation_id INT,
  reporter VARCHAR(255),
  report_date DATE,
  report_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE HumanRightsViolations (
 id INT,
 date DATE,
 location VARCHAR(255),
 violation_type VARCHAR(255),
 description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Victims (
 id INT,
 violation_id INT,
 name VARCHAR(255),
 age INT,
 gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE Perpetrators (
 id INT,
 violation_id INT,
 name VARCHAR(255),
 affiliation VARCHAR(255),
 role VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Witnesses (
 id INT,
 violation_id INT,
 name VARCHAR(255),
 contact VARCHAR(20),
 statement TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Reports (
 id INT,
 violation_id INT,
 date DATE,
 reporter_id INT,
 report_text TEXT
)
